message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $10,000. This is a special opportunity to acquire an item valued at $12,000 to you at a competitive price. I believe this is a fair deal that benefits both of us.

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate the value you're placing on the product, but $10,000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it.  Let's see if we can find a middle ground.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. I am willing to sell the product for $9,500. This price reflects the value of the product while also considering your budget. I hope this proposal works for you.
